content:
Hi All,
We are looking for supporting NameRepresentationCode --> http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0465/index.html
in FHIR profiles. Does not find a suitable place in Human Name. Has any one worked on that.
I have got one extension for same : https://www.hl7.org/fhir/extension-iso21090-en-representation.html
It would be handled with the extension
